## Description {#details}

This is the interface for LLVM&#39;s primary stateless and local alias analysis.

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is the AA result object for the basic, local, and stateless alias</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analysis. It implements the AA query interface in an entirely stateless</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// manner. As one consequence, it is never invalidated due to IR changes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// While it does retain some storage, that is used as an optimization and not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to preserve information from query to query. However it does retain handles</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to various other analyses and must be recomputed when those analyses are.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns a bitmask that should be unconditionally applied to the ModRef</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// info of a memory location. This allows us to eliminate Mod and/or Ref</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// from the ModRef info based on the knowledge that the memory location</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// points to constant and/or locally-invariant memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If IgnoreLocals is true, then this method returns NoModRef for memory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that points to a local alloca.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2e">ModRefInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicaaresult/#accb256ada9f5d92e5a776e459618cd1d">getModRefInfoMask</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp;AAQI,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A Heuristic for aliasGEP that searches for a constant offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// between the variables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// GetLinearExpression has some limitations, as generally zext(%x + 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// != zext(%x) + zext(1) if the arithmetic overflows. GetLinearExpression</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will therefore conservatively refuse to decompose these expressions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// However, we know that, for all %x, zext(%x) != zext(%x + 1), even if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the addition overflows.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> constantOffsetHeuristic(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DecomposedGEP &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> V1Size,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize">LocationSize</a> V2Size, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp;AAQI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
